column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The food came and definitely lifted our spirits
column2: but not even into the second slice
column3: Tony came by and handed us the check. We were planning on trying the tiramisu
column4: but maybe next time! He did the same to the table behind us
column5: who complained that they were not done
column6: which we could tell even from our table. He did apologize after bringing back the check
column8: but the damage had been done.
